sections.heading: What I am looking for
paragraphs: I am currently seeking a position as a data scientist in a collaborative, fast-paced, and challenging environment. I enjoy solving problems using a data driven approach, and apply my coding skills on top of my data intuition to find quick and adaptive solutions!

paragraphs.text: I am a data scientist with a passion for visual storytelling. I believe that
paragraphs.bold: words, data, and its contextual representation are the most powerful tools to change the world
both data analysis and programming-focused skills
paragraphs.textAfter: . During my bachelor's degree, I learned most of the programming skills and techniques I put to use on a daily basis, for my data-related projects as well. Those skills turned out to be very useful in the data visualization field, my master's thesis is in fact on the topic.

sections.heading: Previous work experience and new horizons

parts.content: As you can see in my
page, I worked as a full-stack developer for 14 months, mostly on the frontend side of development. At work, i used ReactJS and the Springboot framework, with the occasional JSP page here and there.

paragraphs: I am now looking forward to a data-focused position where I can combine both of my developed areas of expertise.

sections.heading: Additional Info
paragraphs: I feel fortunate to be born in a setting that allowed me to learn so much among extraordinarily talented teachers and peers.

My native language is Italian, but since I was a teenager, I have developed most of my interests online; therefore, I do not really consider English as a second language. Every class in my master's degree was held in English and I both bonded and worked, mostly with international students.
I'm excited to bring my skills to an exciting and challenging setting for my first data-related job :)
